SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dtime ASC) AS rownm ,b.est_no ,b.ctrt_nm ,b.company_name ,b.company_phone ,b.request_user_id AS requestUserNm ,a.reg_dtime ,a.expire_dtime ,a.etp_stts_cd ,c.appr_dtime FROM TB_EST_MST a, TB_EST_DOC b, TB_ETP_HIST c, TB_USERS d WHERE 1=1 AND a.est_doc_id = b.est_doc_id AND a.est_id = c.etp_id AND b.request_user_id = d.user_no
ORDER BY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY a.reg_dtime ASC) DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{limit}
